Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: List of Cubes (Separated by Delimiter, Accepts Wild card)

Parameters.Name: pView
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: View (will default to pSubset if left blank)

Parameters.Name: pSub
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Subset (will default to pView if left blank)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Dimension(s) to create empty processing subsets for (separated by delimiter), * = all

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: List Delimiter (default value if blank = '&')

Parameters.Name: pSubN
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Create N level subset for all dims not mentioned in pDim
